casebody.data:
Jeromie THORPE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016

Deren Manasevit, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Marjorie Allen Dauster, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Jeromie Thorpe's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 731, 140 A.3d 319 (2016), is denied.
